news_header: JHL supports industrial disputes and embargoes affecting transport and technology sectors in Finland.
news_original_title: Liitoilta uusia tukitoimia Teollisuusliiton työtaistelujen tueksi
news_text: Finland's largest public trade union, JHL, continues to support the Industrial Federation's industrial disputes. The ACP transport sector is threatened by the fifth embargo as a support measure for the technology industry. The JHL embargo concerns areas of the agreement where the Industry Association has issued a strike warning. The ACP embargo covers companies designated by the technology industry. Support measures affect freight handling, particularly in ports and rail transport. The activities of the ACP are directed at ports and their handling of goods. The Seamen's Union, Services PAM, Construction Union, and Electricity Union also support the Industry Union.
